prompt: Andy, another part of the recycling team decided he would gather tin foil wrappers. If he was able to pick up 34 wrappers around the village dumpster and his best friend Max was able to collect 15, how many wrappers were gathered in total?
summary: var1 = [find](Andy wrappers) # 34, var2 = [find](wrappers from Max) # 15, var1 = [add](var1, var2), [CALL] # 34 + 15 = 49, [return](var1) # 49

prompt: Adam had 5 dollars. At the store he spent $2 on a new game. If he got another 5 dollars for his allowance, how much money does he have now?
summary: var1 = [find](starting money) # 5, var2 = [find](spent money) # 2, var1 = [sub](var1, var2), [CALL] # 5 - 2 = 3, var2 = [find](new money) # 5, var1 = [add](var1, var2), [CALL] # 3 + 5 = 8, [return](var1) # 8

prompt: With the end of the month coming in two days, they decided to sell cookies to the neighboring villages as well. If they sold 23 packs on one village and 28 on the other, how many cookies were they able to sell in the other villages?
summary: var1 = [find](1st village cookies) # 23, var2 = [find](2nd village cookies) # 28, var1 = [add](var1, var2), [CALL] # 23 + 28 = 51, [return](var1) # 51
